CodeList.Name: Geographic Place Name
CodeList.Description: This is a placeholder codelist: populate it with ISO/3166-2 codes for sub-national level-1 places (see http://www.commondatahub.com/live/geography/state_province_region/iso_3166_2_state_codes) Whenever a sub-national place is included in this list, the country it belongs to must also be included here, so that GEOGRAPHIC_PLACE_NAME_HIERARCHY can be populated accordingly. The root of the hierarchy is always the international level, so it is included by default below.
